pingSound.name: Ping sound
pingSound.description: Plays a sound when someone writes your name in chat

placeholders.gamemode: Displays the your current game mode.
placeholders.pitch: Displays the pitch angle (vertical rotation) of your head, useful for orientation.
placeholders.location: Combines your X, Y, and Z coordinates into a single formatted location string.
placeholders.x: Shows your current X coordinate (east/west position in the world).
placeholders.yaw: Displays the yaw angle (horizontal rotation) of your head, indicating direction faced.
placeholders.y: Shows your current Y coordinate (vertical height or elevation in the world).
placeholders.z: Displays your current Z coordinate (north/south position in the world).
placeholders.position: Shows a formatted string including your position and orientation (coordinates + yaw/pitch).
placeholders.biome: Displays the name of the biome the player is currently in.
placeholders.dimension: Indicates the current dimension the player is in.

placeholderMenu.name: SmartChat Placeholders
placeholderMenu.title: Placeholders
placeholderMenu.duplicateIdentifier: There are multiple placeholders with this name so you need to use the full identifier
placeholderMenu.uniqueIdentifier: There is only one placeholder with this name so you can omit the namespace
